stories.title: Adjust Slider Value
stories.description: As a user, I want to adjust a slider so that I can select a specific numerical value.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the slider is visible, When I drag the slider handle, Then the numerical value next to the slider should update in real-time to reflect the slider's position.

stories.title: Display Initial Slider State
stories.description: As a user, I want to see the default position of the slider so that I can understand its starting value.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I view the slider, Then it should be positioned at its default start point with the value '12' displayed beside it.
Given the page is loaded, When I view the interface, Then a heading with text 'Slider' should be visible above the slider.

stories.title: Update Slider through Input Box
stories.description: As a user, I want to update the slider value by entering a number in the input box so that I can set it precisely.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the input box is visible, When I enter a valid number, Then the slider handle should move to reflect the entered value.
